short_summary: M50 CCFDP & West Wing Controller Replacement
description: The National Research Council Canada wishes to award a contract for the replacement of the M-50 CPFC and West wing Controller following the case of a system incompatibility with the ongoing system capability. Only the new Schneider Ecostruxure platform can provide ongoing system compatibility and interoperability with the existing NRC infrastructure.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement

**Tender Title**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites you to participate in the advance contract award notice for the M50 CPFC and West Wing Controller Replacement project.

**Tender Reference Number**
CB-539-57246764

**Amendment**
This tender is subject to amendment 5, issued on 2023-11-01.

**Important Dates**
- Bid Closing: 2023-11-01T14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-13
- Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

**Project Overview**
The NRC wishes to award a contract for the M50 CPFC and West Wing Controller Replacement. The successful supplier must provide a solution that ensures ongoing system compatibility and interoperability with the existing NRC infrastructure, while removing potential service disruptions.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Procurement Category**
SRVTGD (Research, Science and Technology  - Goods, Services, Technical)

**Procurement Method**
Advance Contract Award Notice

**Contact Information**
If you are interested in bidding, please contact Tania Backes at (613) 410-3834, or via email at [Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca).

**Document**
The tender package is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22341/23-58143_acan_en.pdf) for English or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22341/23-58143_acan_fr.pdf) for French.

**Notice**
Please note that this is an advance contract award notice, indicating the intention to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier. Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities to express interest before the bid closing
